name: Frayed Dice
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022. The devil has given you a chance to escape from hell, but you can only use 2 weapons that are randomly given to you each round, both of them suck, but one sucks less than the other. Will you be able to escape hell by using two terrible weapons?

Sprites, Programming, Music : SleP16
Music assistance: SallyGWritter
